content.text: Forliewbs is an infamous New World pirate captain who allied himself with Whitebeard.

Forliewbs is a chubby man with a large rectangular flat nose, facial hair, a scar under his left eye, and wears a crown with some sort of spiral, horn-like objects. He wears an ascot around his neck and some sort of purple shawl around his shoulders. Additionally, he wears a purple long sleeved shirt, a pair of light colored pants, and has a sash going across his right side.

Forliewbs highly treasures friendship as he was willing to risk his own life to save Ace from execution. Furthermore, he is not one to back down in the face of obstacles, as he was willing to go against all of Marine Headquarters and even continued charging against the Marines after the ice under their feet had been melted.

Forliewbs was a subordinate captain to the Whitebeard Pirates. He displayed high loyalty to Whitebeard in that he had no problem with putting his own life on the line to answer Whitebeard's call to save Ace.
Forliewbs is a fearsome pirate who has managed to achieve an infamous reputation in the New World such that he was able to ally himself with Whitebeard.
In the past, Forliewbs became a renowned pirate in the New World and allied himself with Whitebeard as a subordinate captain.

When Portgas D. Ace was to be executed at Marineford, Forliewbs and his crew joined forces with the Whitebeard Pirates in order to save him from execution. While the Marines were bracing for the arrival of the pirates, Forliewbs and the allied fleet of the 43 subordinate captains caught them by surprise when the fleet suddenly appeared out of nowhere just off the shores of Marineford.

After the siege wall was raised and Akainu melted the ice with his magma powers, Forliewbs boarded Whitebeard's hidden ship and entered the plaza with the help of Little Oars Jr. Forliewbs then jumped off the paddle ship and prepared to continue the fight to save Ace.
